title: React/iOS Developer Needed - Ongoing App Development from AI-Generated Code
job_overview:
Looking for a skilled developer to partner with me in creating and publishing multiple iOS apps. I use Claude AI to generate the initial React code and need someone to:

Convert React code to React Native/iOS
Handle all technical aspects of deployment
Publish apps to TestFlight and App Store
Make necessary optimizations and fixes

Required Skills:

React Native development
iOS development & App Store publishing
API integrations
UI/UX implementation
Problem-solving with AI-generated code

The Role:

PartUpgrade to see actual info hours
Multiple apps planned
Quick turnaround times
Regular communication
Iterative development

Please share:

Your experience with React-to-iOS conversions
Past App Store publications
Availability per week
Communication style
Rate expectations

Looking for someone who can start immediately and handle ongoing projects.
